name: Dr. Mohammad Nurul Huda
bio: Dr. Mohammad Nurul Huda is a Professor and Head of the CSE Department at UIU with over two decades of experience in teaching, research, and academic administration. He specializes in algorithm design, artificial intelligence, and data mining, mentoring countless students and researchers.
job_title: Professor and Head of CSE Department

projects.title: AI-Based Optimization Techniques
projects.description: Developing AI models for solving optimization problems in supply chain management.

projects.title: Data Mining in Healthcare
projects.description: Analyzing large datasets to find trends in medical diagnostics.

projects.title: Algorithmic Trading Systems
projects.description: Creating algorithms for automated stock market trading.

name: Dr. Dewan Md. Farid
bio: Dr. Dewan Md. Farid is a Professor in the CSE Department at UIU, specializing in machine learning, big data analytics, and deep learning. He has published extensively in these areas and actively mentors students for advanced research.

projects.title: Predictive Health Analytics Using Big Data
projects.description: Analyze healthcare trends using machine learning and big data tools.

projects.title: Energy Consumption Prediction
projects.description: Using ML to predict and optimize energy consumption in smart grids.

projects.title: Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing
projects.description: Building deep learning models for language understanding and generation.

name: Dr. Al-Sakib Khan Pathan
bio: Dr. Al-Sakib Khan Pathan is a cybersecurity expert and a Professor at UIU. He is recognized for his work on IoT security, network protocols, and secure systems.

projects.title: IoT Security and Privacy Framework
projects.description: Designing a secure framework for IoT devices.

projects.title: Blockchain in Cybersecurity
projects.description: Integrating blockchain technology into cybersecurity practices.

projects.title: Advanced Network Simulations
projects.description: Simulating network protocols for next-gen communications.

name: Dr. Khondaker Abdullah-Al-Mamun
bio: Dr. Mamun is an IoT and cloud computing specialist, focusing on smart systems. His work addresses urban challenges through innovative IoT applications.

projects.title: Smart IoT Solutions for Urban Development
projects.description: Using IoT for efficient urban development solutions.

projects.title: Cloud Computing for Healthcare
projects.description: Leveraging cloud technologies to improve healthcare delivery systems.

projects.title: IoT for Smart Agriculture
projects.description: Developing IoT-based systems for sustainable agriculture.

name: Dr. Nahid Hossain
bio: Dr. Nahid Hossain is an Assistant Professor at UIU, specializing in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Deep Learning. His research focuses on language understanding, generation, and large language models.

projects.title: Transformer-based Spelling Error Correction Framework for Bangla
projects.description: Developing a transformer model for spelling error correction in Bangla.

projects.title: Text Summarization for Bangla
projects.description: Building NLP models to summarize Bangla texts automatically.

projects.title: Machine Translation for Low-Resource Languages
projects.description: Developing systems for translating low-resource languages.
